name: rxjs-plus
description: Collection of extra operator for RxJS 5

scripts.clean: npm run spec_clean && npm run test_clean
scripts.spec_download_helpers: npm run spec_clean && mkdir .rxjs-spec && curl -L -o .rxjs-spec/rxjs.zip https://github.com/ReactiveX/rxjs/archive/5.2.0.zip && unzip -q -d .rxjs-spec/ .rxjs-spec/rxjs.zip && mv .rxjs-spec/rxjs-5.2.0/spec/helpers/* ./test/helpers && rm -rf .rxjs-spec
scripts.spec_gen_patches: git diff ~/git/rxjs/spec/helpers/testScheduler-ui.ts test/helpers/testScheduler-ui.ts > spec-patch/testScheduler-ui.ts.patch || git diff ~/git/rxjs/spec/helpers/marble-testing.ts test/helpers/marble-testing.ts > spec-patch/marble-testing.ts.patch || git diff ~/git/rxjs/spec/helpers/test-helper.ts test/helpers/test-helper.ts > spec-patch/test-helper.ts.patch || git diff ~/git/rxjs/spec/helpers/tests2png/diagram-test-runner.js test/helpers/tests2png/diagram-test-runner.js > spec-patch/tests2png/diagram-test-runner.js.patch || exit 0
scripts.spec_helper_fix_crlf: cat test/helpers/marble-testing.ts | node ./node_modules/.bin/normalize-newline > test/helpers/marble-testing.ts.tmp && mv -f test/helpers/marble-testing.ts.tmp test/helpers/marble-testing.ts
scripts.spec_apply_patches: patch test/helpers/testScheduler-ui.ts spec-patch/testScheduler-ui.ts.patch && patch test/helpers/marble-testing.ts spec-patch/marble-testing.ts.patch && patch test/helpers/test-helper.ts spec-patch/test-helper.ts.patch && patch test/helpers/tests2png/diagram-test-runner.js spec-patch/tests2png/diagram-test-runner.js.patch
scripts.spec_setup: npm run spec_clean && npm run spec_download_helpers && npm run spec_helper_fix_crlf && npm run spec_apply_patches
scripts.test_build_cjs_run: npm run build_cjs && npm run test_build_run
scripts.test_build_run: npm run test_build && npm run test
scripts.test_full_rebuild: npm run clean && npm run spec-setup && npm run test_build
scripts.tests2png: npm run test_build && mkdir -p tmp/docs/img && mocha --opts test/tests2png.opts test-js

author: Martin Sikora
